title: Never Get a Degree Just for a Higher Paycheck (Hour 1)
description:
Ken Coleman & George Kamel discuss:

Maxing out a 401(k),

Buying out a car lease,

Selling a vehicle vs. paying it off,

Going into debt to go to law school,

Opening a new IRA,

Investing an inheritance vs. paying off the house.


Support Our Sponsor:

PODS Moving & Storage

Carwiser

Churchill Mortgage


Have a question for the show? Call 888-825-5225 Weekdays from 2-5pm ET

Want a plan for your money? Find out where to start: https://bit.ly/3nInETX
Listen to all The Ramsey Network podcasts: https://bit.ly/3GxiXm6

Learn more about your ad choices. https://www.megaphone.fm/adchoices
